attributes.action: Let the younger generation have their say on the EU Referendum
attributes.background: The younger generation are yet to have their say on the EU Referendum and I feel this is  necessary as this generation is the one who has to grow up in this country. I feel that anyone who would be old enough to vote by the next general election should have a say on our future.

rejection.details: It's not clear how you would like young people to be able to have their say.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like to happen.
